name: Automation QA Engineer (Analytics Platform)
description:
We are looking for an experienced QA engineer who is passionate about testing automation. You will be helping us author and maintain test cases for the set of data analysis tools (mostly web applications).

If you love to investigate users' use cases in the data analysis domain and build test automation for complex web applications to improve product releases and the user experience – apply! Not only will you have the opportunity to test complex applications in the data analysis domain, but you will also become part of a team that helps our colleagues make data-driven decisions for their products. In other words, you will be influencing the future of JetBrains products and their users.

Responsibilities:

  • Developing test cases for test automation.

  • E2E test automation.

  • Work with DevOps to integrate autotests in development and release processes.

  • Manual testing.

Basic qualifications:

  • At least 3 years of experience working for IT companies.

  • Strong skills in test automation for web applications.

  • Good understanding of programming fundamentals, software engineering concepts, and processes.

  • Ability to work in a team as well as working independently and taking initiative, with corresponding planning and time-management skills.

  • Strong communication and interpersonal skills.

  • Attention to detail.

  • Proficient English.

Bonus qualifications:

  • Experience with Python, Pytest.

  • Knowledge of SQL for query verification.

  • Knowledge of product analytics concepts.

  • Unit/integration tests on Java/Kotlin/JavaScript.

Our team:

As part of the JetBrains family, we work closely with the data analytics team to achieve a better understanding of our customers and their needs. Our goal is to help other teams with data-based decision making.

About JetBrains:

At JetBrains, code is our passion. For over 20 years, we’ve been striving to make the strongest, most effective developer tools. By automating routine checks and corrections, our tools speed up coding and software development, freeing you to grow, discover, and create.

We offer:

  • Spacious comfortable office (open 24/7) with a private parking lot.
  • Competitive salary: determined individually, but above industry average.
  • Bonuses based on your performance.
  • Voluntary health insurance for employees, their spouse, and their children under age 18 (including dental insurance).
  • 5 weeks of paid vacation.
  • Full salary during sick leave.
  • Flexible work schedule.
  • Hot meals, free drinks, fruits, and snacks.
  • Office library with specialized work-related books and magazines.
  • Office gym (with washrooms).
  • Training, including English and German language classes.
  • Opportunities to travel to professional conferences in Europe and the US.
  • Job relocation help.
